${modID}:ThermiteGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Kindle to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SolarRampart.NAME: Solar Rampart

${modID}:FierySplendor.NAME: Fiery Splendor
${modID}:FierySplendor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your ${modID}:Cure. NL Double ALL ${modID}:Kindle. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BringTheHeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your ${modID}:Cure to ALL enemies.
